noAdminsWarn: Whoop! Looks like there are no admins in the game at the moment. If you need one, ask [YOUR ADMINS NAMES] to admin someone. They're always admins ðŸ˜‰
unauthorizedMsg: Sorry, you don't have permission to use that command. Have [YOUR ADMINS NAMES] (or a current Admin) give it a go ðŸ˜‰
helpMsg:
I'm the DrinkingJengaBot!
Use these commands to play:
â€¢ `!join` - Join the game!
â€¢ `!start` - Begin the game
â€¢ `!draw` - Draw a card when it's your turn
â€¢ `!decline` - If you don't like your tile, you can skip it (though this invokes a penalty shot)
â€¢ `!detail <text>` - Search for tilenames by name and get their description.
â€¢ `!graveyard` - Lists tiles that have already been drawn. This is useful for the Graveyard tile.
â€¢ `!turn` - See whose turn it is
â€¢ `!order` - See the full order of turns
â€¢ `!tilesleft` - See how many tiles are left in the game
â€¢ `!tileset` - See the full list of tiles
â€¢ `!gamename` - See the current game's name.
â€¢ `!roll <n>` - Roll a single n-sided die (required by some tiles), e.g. `!roll 6` to roll a d6.
â€¢ `!admins` - See who is currently an admin
â€¢ `!leave` - Leave the game ðŸ˜¢
â€¢ `!help` - Show this help message
â€¢ `!adminhelp` - Show the admin help message
adminHelpMsg:
Admin commands:
â€¢ `!reset` - Reset the game to play again
â€¢ `!shuffle` - Shuffle the tiles!
â€¢ `!sameroom [true|false]` - Set same-room mode
â€¢ `!boot <username>` - Boot an inactive player from the game
â€¢ `!kick` - Same as boot
â€¢ `!skip` - Skip the current turn
â€¢ `!admindraw` - Draw a card as an admin. This doesn't advance the turn order, just an extra draw if someone needs it.
â€¢ `!addmin <username>` - Add an admin
â€¢ `!removeadmin <username>` - Remove an admin
â€¢ `!clearusers` - Clear the user list
â€¢ `!end` - End the game and kick all players
â€¢ `!save` - Saves the current game state (only useful for debugging or unusual situations, as the game is saved after each draw).
â€¢ `!load <game name>` - Load a saved game based on its name.
gameOverWarn: Game is over! Reset the game with `!reset` to play again.
gameOverMsg: GG everyone! If you want to play again, use `!reset`.
wrongUserWarn: Whoops, looks like you aren't the most recent player.
unknownCmd: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Use `!help` to see available commands.
resetMsg: Game has been reset and is ready to go!
sameRoomMsg: We are in the same room!
apartMsg: We are NOT in the same room.
needResetWarn: For this change to take effect, an admin needs to `!reset` the game.
notYourTurnWarn: Wait a second, it's not your turn. Wait your turn or `!join`.
noUsersWarn: No users have joined the game.
alreadyJoinedWarn: Hang on there bucko, you're already in the game ðŸ˜‘
gameEndMsg: Game ended, all users have been removed from the game. To continue playing, use `!join` and `!start` to get things back up and running.
readyMsg: I'm alive and ready to play! Use `!help` to see commands
missingArgWarn: Invalid command. This command requires an argument.
detailUsageMsg: To use `!detail`, specify a tile by name, e.g.: `!detail Give 2`
kickUsageMsg: To use `!kick`, just use the player's discord username: `!kick username`
addminUsageMsg: To use `!addmin`, use the player's discord username: `!addmin username`
removeadminUsageMsg: To use `!removeadminUsageMsg`, use the player's discord username: `!removeadmin username`
graveyardEmptyWarn: Graveyard is empty. Draw some tiles first ya walnut
saveInfoMsg: Game is saved! (note: game is saved after every draw)
rollUsageMsg: To use `!roll`, specify the max number for the roll, e.g.: `!roll 6`
